item.title: The 3rd International Design Competition: REIMAGING CITIES TOWARDS CARBON NEUTRALITY
1st Competition - FUTURE CITY: SMART DESIGN FOR POST-PANDEMIC WORLD
item.description: Activities: International Launch Event of UEH - ISCM The Institute of Smart Cities and Management (ISCM) - University of Economics Ho Chi Minh City (UEH) successfully organized the international launch event, along with the award ceremony of the first international design competition.

item.title: The 2nd International Design Competition: SMART CITY+
